Your subconscious mind controls 95% of your actions.
Dreams last only a few seconds — but feel like hours.
You blink around 15–20 times per minute without realizing.
Your brain can store about 2.5 petabytes of data — like a million 1GB flash drives.
People can taste emotions — sadness has a distinct bitter-salty taste.
Subconscious patterns form by age 7 and run most adult behavior.
You make decisions 7 seconds before your brain consciously notices.
Thinking about a workout can actually strengthen your muscles slightly.
Laughter boosts memory and lowers stress hormone levels instantly.
Music can sync brain waves and even alter your mood within 13 seconds.
